1.2.name: wordpress/headway-affiliate-block
1.2.description: The "Headway Affiliate Block" is an add-on block for [Headway Themes]: http://headwaythemes.com that lets you easily add a "powered by headway themes" message anywhere on your website. You can select one of the headway themes official affiliate banners to display alongside your message, and benefit from copy optimized to increase affiliate conversions.
